title: Netflix Subscriber Growth Gets Most Attention Even as Revenue Expected to Jump
sub_head: The streaming giant is seen posting lower per-share earnings amid a slowdown in new subscribers
body:
Netflix Inc. is expected to report slowing subscriber growth to start 2022 as the streaming giant faces questions about its ability to attract new users amid a return to prepandemic conditions and greater competition.
Investors will be combing for clues in Netflixâ€™s first-quarter earnings results, which are set to be released Tuesday afternoon.
